item.title: My Notes for the Solutions Architect Certification
item.description: Introduction I began my solutions architect journey in late August. This blog post will serve as the notes I’ve taken as I’ve followed the course. Will be adding a lot of basics, for folks who are just getting into the world of cloud and infra. Would be ideal if this acts as a segue to someone’s cloud career, if not, a bunch of points for you (and me) to ace the Solutions Architect Exam.
